card_text: This card's name becomes "Fallen of Albaz" while on the field or in the GY. If this card is in your hand or GY: You can send 1 "Fallen of Albaz" or 1 "Branded" Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck to the GY; apply the following effect based on where you sent it from.$N●Hand: Special Summon this card.$N●Deck: Place this card on the bottom of the Deck, then, if you placed this card from your hand, draw 1 card.$NYou can only use this effect of "Albion the Shrouded Dragon" once per turn.
